name: Pet Cats, Save the World
description:
A simple text-based simulator in which you pet cats and, as a result, make the world a better place.

  • Three endings
  • More than 100 randomly generated cats and effects
  • Sparkles!

If the above embed doesn't work for you, please try the philome.la version.

This game is based largely on neongrey's Cat-Petting Simulator, which you should also play and support!
